title: Snow Day Bard Dance
body: When I use the dance emote with Snow Day Bard, he should (like the default texture) make chiming noises on each pulse of his shimmy (you'd know it when you saw it).  For me, he doesn't make the chiming noise for the first two pulses of it.  I'm not sure how to recreate this, and I lack a recording device, but it's just what I said, and then after it's fine.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! We'll look into this and see what the deal is with the audio. ^-^
